member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement
member.summary: A visual element that can be drawn on using SkiaSharp drawing commands.

member.name: C:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the view.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.CanvasSize
member.summary: Gets the current canvas size.
member.remarks: The canvas size may be different to the view size as a result of the current device's pixel density.

member.name: P:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.IgnorePixelScaling
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the drawing canvas should be resized on high resolution displays.
member.remarks: By default, when false, the canvas is resized to 1 canvas pixel per display pixel. When true, the canvas is resized to device independent pixels, and then stretched to fill the view. Although performance is improved and all objects are the same size on different display densities, blurring and pixelation may occur.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.OnPaintSurface(SkiaSharp.Views.Desktop.SKPaintSurfaceEventArgs)
member.param: The event arguments that contain the drawing surface and information.
member.summary: Implement this to draw on the canvas.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.OnRender(System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext)
member.param: The drawing instructions for a specific element. This context is provided to the layout system.
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, participates in rendering operations that are directed by the layout system. The rendering instructions for this element are not used directly when this method is invoked, and are instead preserved for later asynchronous use by layout and drawing.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.OnRenderSizeChanged(System.Windows.SizeChangedInfo)
member.param: Details of the old and new size involved in the change.
member.summary: Raises the SizeChanged event, using the specified information as part of the eventual event data.

member.name: E:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.SKElement.PaintSurface
member.summary: Occurs when the the canvas needs to be redrawn.

member.name: T:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions
member.summary: Various extension methods to convert between SkiaSharp types and Windows types.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToColor(SkiaSharp.SKColor)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp color into a Windows color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToPoint(SkiaSharp.SKPoint)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp point into a Windows point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToRect(SkiaSharp.SKRect)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp rectangle into a Windows rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSize(SkiaSharp.SKSize)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp size into a Windows size.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKBitmap(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource)
member.summary: Converts a Windows BitmapSource into a SkiaSharp bitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a SkiaSharp bitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKColor(System.Windows.Media.Color)
member.summary: Converts a Windows color into a SkiaSharp color.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKImage(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource)
member.summary: Converts a Windows BitmapSource into a SkiaSharp image.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a SkiaSharp image.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKPixmap(System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource,SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.param: The SkiaSharp pixmap to hold the copy of the bitmap data.
member.summary: Converts a Windows BitmapSource into a SkiaSharp pixmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKPoint(System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Converts a Windows point into a SkiaSharp point.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKRect(System.Windows.Rect)
member.summary: Converts a Windows rectangle into a SkiaSharp rectangle.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToSKSize(System.Windows.Size)
member.summary: Converts a Windows size into a SkiaSharp size.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKBitmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp bitmap into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the bitmap data as a Windows WriteableBitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKImage)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp image into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the image data as a Windows WriteableBitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKPixmap)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp pixmap into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the pixel data as a Windows WriteableBitmap.

member.name: M:SkiaSharp.Views.WPF.WPFExtensions.ToWriteableBitmap(SkiaSharp.SKPicture,SkiaSharp.SKSizeI)
member.summary: Converts a SkiaSharp picture into a Windows WriteableBitmap.
member.returns: Returns a copy of the picture as a Windows WriteableBitmap.
